content.text: Match ends, Ludogorets Razgrad 0, Milan 3.

Goal!  Ludogorets Razgrad 0, Milan 3. Fabio Borini (Milan) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Franck Kessié with a cross.
